summary: Nutrient Budgeting MVP: Advanced Prototype Development
Nutrient Budgeting MVP: Advanced KOU Tracking System
Dairy Farm Nutrient Budgeting MVP and Advanced Prototype

content.text: I'll create a unified application that combines the best features from all three codebases into a single, coherent nutrient budget tool optimized for consultants to use on farms.

todos.content: Create project structure and initialize React app with Vite
Merge data structures from all three codebases
Build unified KOU management system
Implement pathway creation and editing
Create visualization components (Sankey, Field Map, Charts)
Add scenario planning functionality
Implement data import/export features
Add financial analysis module
Create comprehensive help and guidance system
Test and optimize for on-farm use
